entry.name: AstraMilitarum/GuardsmanFlavor
entry.value: From the steaming jungles of Catachan to the war-torn fortress world of Cadia, the humble Guardsmen provide the ironclad backbone of the Imperial Guard.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/Cadian_ShockTroopDescription
entry.value: Aggressive infantry who survived the destruction of their planet

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/GuardsmanFlavor
